level.text: Any person on whom a notice has been served pursuant to § 2010 and § 2011 may file a written appeal with the Board of Appeals and Review.

The appeal must be filed within twenty (20) calendar days from the date the notice was served personally, or within twenty-four (24) calendar days of the date the notice was served other than personally.
If service was made by certified mail, the twenty-four (24) day period for filing required under § 2012.2 shall include the date that the notice was mailed under § 2011.2(c).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 14 of Regulation 70-30, approved July 9, 1970 (17 DCR 40), 5EE DCRR, §5.1.
